key.name: background-colour

key.summary: Hexidecimal RGBA colour to use for the button border.

key.name: border-width
key.summary: Pixel width to use for the button border.

key.summary: Pixel height to use for the button, excluding padding.

key.name: horizontal-padding
key.summary: Pixel padding to use left and right of the button text.

key.name: index
key.summary: Index to place the button within the selected position.

key.summary: Position on the panel in which to palce the button.

key.summary: Hexidecimal RGBA colour to use for the button text.

key.summary: Pt size to use for the button text.

key.name: text-style
key.summary: Style to determine how/what text is displayed.

key.name: use-automatic-width
key.summary: Whether width should be based on text + padding, or manually set.

key.name: use-shell-text-colour
key.summary: Whether button text should use the shell theme colour, or be manually set.

key.name: use-shell-text-size
key.summary: Whether button text should use the shell theme size, or be manually set.
